verses.name: Genesis 30:1
verses.text: And when Rachel saw that she bare Jacob no children, Rachel envied her sister; and said unto Jacob, Give me children, or else I die.

verses.name: Genesis 30:2
verses.text: And Jacob’s anger was kindled against Rachel: and he said, Am I in God’s stead, who hath withheld from thee the fruit of the womb?

verses.name: Genesis 30:3
verses.text: And she said, Behold my maid Bilhah, go in unto her; and she shall bear upon my knees, that I may also have children by her.

verses.name: Genesis 30:4
verses.text: And she gave him Bilhah her handmaid to wife: and Jacob went in unto her.

verses.name: Genesis 30:5
verses.text: And Bilhah conceived, and bare Jacob a son.
